Verify the modal content area has padding 25px and text align 'center'
Interact with the image carousel on the homepage
Confirm the current image has source 'carousel_img_1.jpg', rendered dimensions 1200x400px, alt text 'Seasonal sale banner', and is loaded
Verify there are 4 navigation dots
Verify the first navigation dot is active, has background color #007bff, width 10px, height 10px, and border radius 50%
Verify the 'Next' arrow control is enabled and positioned at right 20px, with aria-label 'Next image'
Click to expand the product category dropdown
Verify the dropdown menu is visible, enabled, has width 200px, height 150px, background color #ffffff, and border 1px solid #cccccc
Verify there are 5 options listed
Verify the 'Electronics' option has text 'Electronics', font size 15px, color #333333, padding 8px 12px, and its text aligns to the left
Verify the option 'Apparel' is not selected
Observe the file upload progress bar
Confirm the progress bar is visible, has width 400px, height 20px, background color #e9ecef, border radius 10px, and its left position is 50px from the container's left edge
Verify the current fill value is 75%
Verify the accompanying percentage text '75%' has font size 12px and color #28a745
Verify the fill animation uses a 'linear' timing function over 500ms
Open the date picker calendar
Verify the date picker is visible, has width 280px, height 300px
Verify the selected date '2024-07-15' text has font size 16px and color #ffffff on a background color #007bff
Verify the 'Next Month' button is enabled
Verify the day labels (e.g., 'Sun') have font family 'Roboto' and text align 'center'
Verify the aria-label for the current month is 'July 2024'
Utilize the search bar
Verify the search input field has placeholder 'Search products...', value 'laptops', width 250px, height 38px, padding 8px, and border radius 4px
Verify the search icon image has source 'search_icon.svg' and alt text 'Search'
Verify the search results list, when visible, contains 8 items
Verify each search result item's text color is #333333, font size 14px, and has a margin bottom 5px
Inspect the user profile card
Confirm the profile image has source 'avatar.jpg', rendered dimensions 80x80px, border radius 50%, and loaded within 150ms
Verify the user's name text 'John Doe' has font size 20px, font weight 600, and color #212529
Verify the email text 'john.doe@example.com' has color #6c757d and font family 'Verdana'
Verify the user profile card itself is located at x 50px, y 100px, has width 300px, height 200px, padding 20px, and margin 10px
Trigger the success notification banner
Ensure the notification banner is visible, has background color #d4edda, text color #155724, font size 16px, width 100%, height 50px, positioned at top 0px, left 0px, and a border radius 0px
Verify the close button has aria-label 'Dismiss notification' and is enabled
Verify the banner text is 'Operation successful!' and it uses a fade-out transition duration of 500ms
Scroll down the product details page
Verify the header element remains visible, fixed at top 0px, has width 100%, and background color #ffffff
Verify when the page is scrolled to 'scroll-top 200px', the header's border bottom changes to 1px solid #e0e0e0
Verify an element within the scrollable content has padding 15px, margin top 20px, and its title text 'Product Features' has font size 20px and color #333333
Check the 'Settings' icon button
Confirm the button is visible, enabled, has width 40px, height 40px, border radius 50%, background color #f0f0f0, padding 8px, and aria-label 'Open application settings'
Verify its icon image has source 'settings_gear.svg', rendered dimensions 24x24px, and alt text 'Settings icon'
Verify the button's background color transitions to #e0e0e0 on focused state within 200ms
Interact with the tabbed interface
Verify the 'Details' tab is visible, active, has background color #ffffff, text color #000000, font size 16px, font weight 700, border bottom 2px solid #007bff, and label 'Details'
Verify the 'Reviews' tab is visible, inactive, has background color #f0f0f0, and text color #666666
Verify there are 3 tabs in total
Verify the content area below the tabs has padding 20px and its default text size is 14px
Hover over the 'Help' button
Ensure the tooltip is initially hidden

Verify the tooltip becomes visible, has width 180px, height auto, background color #333333, text color #ffffff, font size 12px, border radius 4px, padding 10px, opacity 0.9, left position 10px from the button's right edge, and exact text content 'Click for assistance and FAQs'
Inspect the audio player controls
Verify the 'Play' button is visible, enabled, has background color #1DB954, width 48px, height 48px, and border radius 50%
Verify the volume slider has value 80% and a width of 120px
Verify the 'Mute' button's aria-label is 'Mute audio' and it shows a 'slash' icon when active
Verify the current time display text is '02:45' with font size 14px
Verify the main progress bar has background color #b3b3b3 for the unfilled portion
Examine the interactive map element
Confirm the map is visible, has width 1024px, and height 768px
Verify the watermark 'Map Data ©2023 GeoCorp' is visible, has font size 10px, color rgba(0,0,0,0.6), and is positioned at bottom 5px, right 5px
Verify all zoom control buttons are enabled and have background color #ffffff
Verify the pin icon has source 'location_pin.png' and rendered dimensions 32x32px
Verify there are 7 visible location markers (pins)
Check the breadcrumbs navigation path
Confirm the breadcrumbs component is visible, positioned at top 15px, left 20px, and contains 4 navigation links
Verify the first link 'Home' has text 'Home', color #007bff, and font size 14px
Verify the last link 'Product Details' has font weight 700 and color #333333
Verify each breadcrumb item has padding 5px 8px
Verify the separator character '>' has font family 'Segoe UI' and color #6c757d
